The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Angel L. Pantoja, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 55080;First DistrictJuly 12, 1971.Gerald W. Getty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (John T. Moran, Jr. and James J. Doherty, Assistant Public Defenders, of counsel,) for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and Themis N. Karnezis, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. PRESIDING JUSTICE BURKE.
